item.title: Crescent Point Energy Confirms January 2017 Dividend
item.description: [Marketwired] - Crescent Point Energy Corp. confirms that the dividend to be paid on February 15, 2017, in respect of January 2017 production, for shareholders of record on January 31, 2017, will be CDN$0.03 per share....

item.description: [Reuters] - The Toronto Stock Exchange's S&P/TSX composite index ended down 7.08 points, or 0.05 percent, at 15,328.15. Crescent Point Energy Corp fell 1.9 percent to C$18.17 and Bank of Montreal slipped 0.2 percent to C$97.17.
